name: Finding Coots
description:
Finding Coots is a exciting adventure game filled with exploration, mystery, romance?!?! (probably not) and 

This game was made for the Ludwig Gamejam 2023! Though it may be short, i put alot of time and effort into this game so i really hope you try it out!

Controls

Z - Interact

X - Back

< ^ >  - Arrow Controls to move

Due to the game jam requirements, this game is pretty short, so i may in the future continue this project . The ROM file is attached if you would like to play this game on a Gameboy Color emulator or a real Gameboy color (Yes, it works on an actual cartridge) But i recommend you play this on browser for the best experience.  Make sure to comment your thoughts on the game 

Game Developed by Turbostar

Music composed by spire, GameGear

Cover Art by crea ☆#6297

[ROM currently unavailable, so you’ll have to play on browser]
